title: Mercury Transit in the 2nd House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 2nd house for Sagittarius Ascendant, focus shifts to speech, values, and financial planning. Communication becomes practical and result-oriented, especially around money, savings, and family matters. This is a favorable phase for negotiations, budgeting, and using skills to increase income. However, blunt speech or over-analysis of finances can create tension at home. When handled with clarity and restraint, this transit supports smart earnings, articulate speech, and value-based decisions.
closing: This Mercury transit sharpens financial thinking and speech. With balance, it supports steady income and clear value-driven choices.
